quote: Well, I miss my wife, you know,"" I said. ""But I also miss the feeling of, I don’t know, comfort. The sense you’re where you’re supposed to be, with someone you’re supposed to be with.
quote_letters: WELL I MISS MY WIFE YOU KNOW I SAID BUT I ALSO MISS THE FEELING OF I DONT KNOW COMFORT THE SENSE YOURE WHERE YOURE SUPPOSED TO BE WITH SOMEONE YOURE SUPPOSED TO BE WITH
